magic-square_key2: `Magic Square` is that kind of square in which sum of each row, sum of each column and sum of both the diagonals is equal.
magic-square_key3: You have to write this program that takes a `nested list` as `input` and checks whether it is a `magic square` or not?
magic-square_key5: This is not a magic square :
magic-square_key6: Because the sum of elements of the second row is not 15 nahi hai, therefore this is not a magic square.

magic-square_key9: Write this program for square of any size, square of any size so that if a user enters square of any size, your program should give the correct `output`.
